sentence: Meanwhile, in the GOP primary for the state's gubernatorial race, Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), who Trump endorsed Saturday, is up against former Rep. Lou Barletta (R-Pa.), Montgomery County commissioner Joseph Gale, former U.S. Attorney William McSwain and Ridley Township Commissioner Dave White, among other candidates.
author: Lexi Lonas
title: Sunday shows preview: Democrats' abortion rights bill blocked; Pennsylvania, N.C. primaries near

sentence: Trump-endorsed state Sen. Doug Mastriano also won the nomination for Pennsylvania governor, but he was already well on track to victory before Trump backed him in recent days.
author: Aaron Blake
title: 6 takeaways from primaries in Pennsylvania, North Carolina and more

sentence: They'll join Trump-backed gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a state senator who attended the Jan. 6 rally ahead of the Capitol riot and served as a phony Trump elector in an effort to overturn his loss.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Cawthorns loss highlights Trumps waning influence but election deniers win big in GOP primaries
